column4: is there any sense in RoundCube Webmail on DCHP-Internet box?
static ip would be preferred but if you hold your dns uptodate, dhcp shouldn't matter
thanks , I have to install bind9? What to try for training dovecot+postfix+courier : Ubuntu Server or ubuntu Desktop with X?
a dns-proxy like dnsmasq should be sufficient and is much easier to setup than bind9. server/desktop... its your choice, i only run debian-servers :)
